entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Maple Plains
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maple Plains 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: -3.5°C
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: NNW 13 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 20 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
